title: Zenata
data:

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A master weaponsmith, her flesh melding into steel so smoothly that it's hard to tell where one ends and the other begins. She entered the Dungeon to search for the secrets of an ancient, long-suppressed cult, said to have exalted metal over flesh. The price of knowledge was her humanity - a price she paid eagerly. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Location](#Location)
- [3 Spells](#Spells)
- [4 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [5 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Zenata, Seeker of Sheza** is an extremely dangerous [unique](/Unique "Unique"), particularly lethal to low-AC spellcasters. Her Sheza's Dance will summon a pack of hasted [dancing weapons](/Dancing_weapon "Dancing weapon"), which will move at stupendous speed to encircle the player. For every two weapons adjacent to her victim, her smite-targeted Resonance Strike increases in power.

## Location

- [Elven Halls](/Elven_Halls "Elven Halls")
- [Vaults](/Vaults "Vaults"): 1-4
- [Crypt](/Crypt "Crypt")

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                                        |                                                     |
| :---------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Resonance Strike](/Resonance_Strike "Resonance Strike") (3d15 - 7d15) | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Sheza's Dance](/Sheza%27s_Dance "Sheza's Dance")                      | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Zenata will be much easier to fight if you disable her ability to cast spells. [Phial of floods](/Phial_of_floods "Phial of floods") is an ideal tool for that, but if you don't rely on spells yourself, just use a [scroll of silence](/Scroll_of_silence "Scroll of silence").
- Hasted dancing weapons are **blazingly** fast. Once she has summoned them, escaping Zenata is almost impossible - even a [scroll of blinking](/Scroll_of_blinking "Scroll of blinking") will have them rush to be in melee range of you in one or two turns.
  - Strategies that normally work against dancing weapons are as effective as ever - [Borgnjor's Vile Clutch](/Borgnjor%27s_Vile_Clutch "Borgnjor's Vile Clutch"), [Summon Cactus Giant](/Summon_Cactus_Giant "Summon Cactus Giant"), [Airstrike](/Airstrike "Airstrike") and [Iskenderun's Mystic Blast](/Iskenderun%27s_Mystic_Blast "Iskenderun's Mystic Blast") are all spells with irresistible, unavoidable physical damage bound to tear through their minuscule HP pools. Many of these spells can also damage Zenata herself.
- Zenata herself is not particularly durable, lacking in elemental resistances or even [see invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible"). She should be fairly easy to take down with a few attacks or spells - though getting this damage in before getting swarmed by her summons is a different story.
- Expect to reset the battle a few times with a [scroll of teleportation](/Scroll_of_teleportation "Scroll of teleportation") until she abstains from summoning dancing weapons for a turn or two, and leaves herself wide open for the kill. Pushing a battle when she has enough dancing weapons to completely encircle you is suicide.

## History

- Zenata was introduced in [0.29](/0.29 "0.29").

Zenata

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Zenata a 
HP 118-240
HD 15
XP 1849
Speed 10
AC 10
EV 10
Will 100
Attack1 35 (hit: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type human, human
Flags Speaks
Warm-blooded
Unique
Female
A master weaponsmith, her flesh melding into steel so smoothly that it's hard to tell where one ends and the other begins. She entered the Dungeon to search for the secrets of an ancient, long-suppressed cult, said to have exalted metal over flesh. The price of knowledge was her humanity - a price she paid eagerly.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Location
  • 3 Spells
  • 4 Tips & Tricks
  • 5 History

Useful Info

Zenata, Seeker of Sheza is an extremely dangerous unique, particularly lethal to low-AC spellcasters. Her Sheza's Dance will summon a pack of hasted dancing weapons, which will move at stupendous speed to encircle the player. For every two weapons adjacent to her victim, her smite-targeted Resonance Strike increases in power.

Location

  • Elven Halls
  • Vaults: 1-4
  • Crypt

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Resonance Strike (3d15 - 7d15) Wizard flag
Slot2 Sheza's Dance Wizard flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Zenata will be much easier to fight if you disable her ability to cast spells. Phial of floods is an ideal tool for that, but if you don't rely on spells yourself, just use a scroll of silence.
  • Hasted dancing weapons are blazingly fast. Once she has summoned them, escaping Zenata is almost impossible - even a scroll of blinking will have them rush to be in melee range of you in one or two turns.
    • Strategies that normally work against dancing weapons are as effective as ever - Borgnjor's Vile Clutch, Summon Cactus Giant, Airstrike and Iskenderun's Mystic Blast are all spells with irresistible, unavoidable physical damage bound to tear through their minuscule HP pools. Many of these spells can also damage Zenata herself.
  • Zenata herself is not particularly durable, lacking in elemental resistances or even see invisible. She should be fairly easy to take down with a few attacks or spells - though getting this damage in before getting swarmed by her summons is a different story.
  • Expect to reset the battle a few times with a scroll of teleportation until she abstains from summoning dancing weapons for a turn or two, and leaves herself wide open for the kill. Pushing a battle when she has enough dancing weapons to completely encircle you is suicide.

History

  • Zenata was introduced in 0.29.

rawPage:
{{version031}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Zenata, Seeker of Sheza''' is an extremely dangerous [[unique]], particularly lethal to low-AC spellcasters. Her Sheza's Dance will summon a pack of hasted [[dancing weapon]]s, which will move at stupendous speed to encircle the player. For every two weapons adjacent to her victim, her smite-targeted Resonance Strike increases in power.

==Location==
*[[Elven Halls]]
*[[Vaults]]: 1-4
*[[Crypt]]

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Zenata will be much easier to fight if you disable her ability to cast spells. [[Phial of floods]] is an ideal tool for that, but if you don't rely on spells yourself, just use a [[scroll of silence]].
*Hasted dancing weapons are '''blazingly''' fast. Once she has summoned them, escaping Zenata is almost impossible - even a [[scroll of blinking]] will have them rush to be in melee range of you in one or two turns.
**Strategies that normally work against dancing weapons are as effective as ever - [[Borgnjor's Vile Clutch]], [[Summon Cactus Giant]], [[Airstrike]] and [[Iskenderun's Mystic Blast]] are all spells with irresistible, unavoidable physical damage bound to tear through their minuscule HP pools. Many of these spells can also damage Zenata herself.
*Zenata herself is not particularly durable, lacking in elemental resistances or even [[see invisible]]. She should be fairly easy to take down with a few attacks or spells - though getting this damage in before getting swarmed by her summons is a different story.
*Expect to reset the battle a few times with a [[scroll of teleportation]] until she abstains from summoning dancing weapons for a turn or two, and leaves herself wide open for the kill. Pushing a battle when she has enough dancing weapons to completely encircle you is suicide.

==History==
*Zenata was introduced in [[0.29]].
